reviewText: I lived in the same apartment as the man in the video for about a year. He is the happiest guy you will ever meet! Great person to get to know. I don't live there anymore but I do miss talking to him all the time. This man proves that nothing can stop you from doing things you want!

While researching my latest novel, which includes a young athlete who becomes disabled, a friend recommended this tape as part of my research. I was glad to buy a used copy. The affable and handsome host provides a clear workout routine, and shows how differently-abled people can find a way to exercise and stay healthy and active. An inspiration, and even applicable to non-disabled people looking for alternative exercise routines.
